INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the toxicity of the antimitotic due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the clarithromycin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Strict clinical and biological monitoring. Possibly, use another antibiotic.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the neurotoxicity of the antimitotic due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the cobicistat
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Strict clinical monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of the antimitotic.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the toxicity of the antimitotic due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the erythromycin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Strict clinical and biological monitoring. Possibly, use another antibiotic.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the toxicity of the antimitotic, due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the protease inhibitor.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Strict clinical monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of the antimitotic.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the neurotoxicity of the antimitotic, due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the itraconazole
Increase of the neurotoxicity of the antimitotic, due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the ketoconazole
Risk of increase of the pulmonary toxicity of the mitomycin and of the vinca alkaloids
Increase of the neurotoxicity of the antimitotic, due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the posaconazole
Risk of increase of the toxicity of the antimitotic due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the telithromycin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Strict clinical and biological monitoring. Possibly, use another antibiotic.
